product_name: Deuter Compact EXP 12 Hydration Pack - 100 fl. oz. - 2014 Closeout
long_description: With an expandable main compartment for longer rides, the Deuter Compact EXP 12 hydration pack has a highly breathable padded back system to keep the pack riding cool and comfortable.
short_description: With an expandable main compartment for longer rides, the Deuter Compact EXP 12 hydration pack has a highly breathable padded back system to keep the pack riding cool and comfortable.
